text: Ezɨ azeniba vaghvagha, dar dughiar orangtɨziba gɨvasava amima, atriviba uan mɨdorozir gumaziba isa uan apaniba ko mɨsoghasa zui. Ezɨ Devit Amonia mɨsoghasa Joap ko, uan mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapaniba ko Israelian mɨdorozir gumaziba, a bar me amangi. Ezɨ me ghua Amonia mɨsogha me abɨragha, Raban nguibar ekiamɨn mɨdorozim fore. Ezɨ Devit uabɨ mɨdorozim bagha ghuzir puvatɨgha Jerusalemra iti.
